lumis.portal.user

Interface IUserDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDaoJdbc

    public interface IUserDao
    Interface for user DAO operations.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 7370 $ $Date: 2007-06-12 13:50:49 -0300 (Tue, 12 Jun 2007) $
